content.description: You will hear an excerpt that consists of an instrumental introduction followed by a section for soloists, chorus, and chamber orchestra. The instrumental introduction will be played twice; then the vocal section will be played twice. Before listening to each section for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: In the vocal section, the melody sung by the chorus begins with scale degrees

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
